title: Mother Tongue - effect of using second person

content.question: The effect of using the second person pronoun in Paragraphs 4 and 6 is to

choices.label: emphasize the author's awareness of an audience
illustrate the effectiveness of using informal diction when speaking publicly
echo the style of the author's talk described in paragraph two
enlarge the scope of the discussion to include differences in usage by native speakers of English

content.answer: emphasize the author's awareness of an audience

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
